duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospect for new business clients by setting up face-to-face meetings within the prescribed territory.
Manage and coordinate the entire sales cycle from initial sales appointments to ongoing customer relationship management.
Promote business products to prospective customers in a clear and professional manner, acting in a demeanor always befitting a business setting.
Analyze the prospects' needs and interests, acting in a conciliatory manner to properly determine the products that best fit their needs.
Complete and submit accurate new business paperwork.
Develop and maintain strong relationships with customers to ensure customer satisfaction and retention.
Participate in team meetings, trainings, and workshops.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
